Extension Name: ProductiveTube Shorts Blocker

Description:

Overview: The ProductiveTube Shorts Blocker is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your YouTube experience by blocking short video elements, commonly known as "Shorts." With the growing popularity of short-form content on YouTube, it's easy to find oneself endlessly scrolling through a barrage of brief videos. This extension aims to bring back productivity to your YouTube sessions by allowing you to filter out these short videos and focus on longer, more substantial content.

Key Features:
1. Seamless Integration:
+ The extension seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, adding a discreet icon to your toolbar for easy access and control.
2. Customizable Blocking:
+ Users have the flexibility to customize the threshold duration for videos. Set the duration limit according to your preference, and the extension will filter out any videos below that threshold.
3. Whitelist Functionality:
+ For users who enjoy certain short-form content, the extension provides a whitelist feature. Add specific channels or keywords to the whitelist, and videos from these sources will still be visible, ensuring you don't miss out on content you enjoy.
4. Visual Indicators:
+ The extension provides clear visual indicators on the YouTube interface, signaling which videos are being blocked. This allows users to easily identify the impact of the extension and make informed decisions about their content consumption.
5. Productivity Statistics:
+ Keep track of your productivity gains with the built-in statistics feature. The extension provides insights into how much time you've saved by blocking short videos, encouraging a more intentional and focused viewing experience.
6. User-Friendly Interface:
+ The user interface is intuitive and user-friendly, making it easy for users to configure settings, manage whitelists, and view productivity statistics.
7. Privacy-Focused:
+ The extension prioritizes user privacy, ensuring that no personal data is collected or shared. It operates solely on the client side, enhancing your YouTube experience without compromising your privacy.
8. Regular Updates:
+ The extension is designed to adapt to changes in YouTube's interface and features. Regular updates will be provided to ensure compatibility with the latest YouTube updates and improvements to the extension's functionality.

How to Use:
1. Install the ProductiveTube Shorts Blocker from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Customize your settings, including the duration threshold and any whitelisted channels or keywords.
3. Enjoy a more focused and productive YouTube experience as the extension automatically filters out short videos.

Take control of your YouTube experience and make every viewing session more intentional with the ProductiveTube Shorts Blocker extension!
